title: I need help on getting League to play for me may i have some help please?
body: for some reason when i go to hit play it shows its gray and says We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again. but when i try that it didn't work its still gray and i try to reinstall league it still shows its gray i need help please

replies.body: Most of the time when that play button grays out, it's a good sign that your network isn't able to get a strong enough signal from our servers in order to put you into a match. Let's do a quick check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure they're configured in a way so that League can get a solid link with its servers and get you back on the Rift.
i think i got it fixed i just reinstalled it again i think it working now it must of not downloaded all the way and thx for the help :)
